SEARCH
Package com.example.frontend

Class WebController

java.lang.Object
com.example.frontend.WebController
@Controller @SessionAttributes({"searchCache","inputCache","openaiCache","ResultOpenAICache"}) public class WebController extends Object

Main Spring MVC controller for handling web requests related to search, URL insertion, OpenAI integration, and system statistics.

This controller interacts with an RMI backend service (via IGateway) to perform search operations, retrieve statistics, and insert URLs into the system queue. It also manages view rendering, session state, and WebSocket messaging.

Session attributes:

  • searchCache: Cached search results for pagination and re-rendering
  • inputCache: Last user input for search
  • openaiCache: Cached result from OpenAI (if enabled)
  • ResultOpenAICache: Flag to track OpenAI result state

  • Method Details

    • searchCache

      @ModelAttribute("searchCache") public List<SearchResult> searchCache()
      Initializes session attribute for storing cached search results.
      Returns:
      an empty list of search results.

    • inputCache

      @ModelAttribute("inputCache") public String inputCache()
      Initializes session attribute for storing the last input query.
      Returns:
      an empty string.

    • openaiCache

      @ModelAttribute("openaiCache") public String openaiCache()
      Initializes session attribute for caching OpenAI result.
      Returns:
      an empty string.

    • ResultOpenAICache

      @ModelAttribute("ResultOpenAICache") public String ResultOpenAICache()
      Initializes session attribute for tracking OpenAI checkbox state.
      Returns:
      "off" by default.

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the controller by retrieving the gateway from the RMI client.

    • redirect

      @GetMapping("/") public String redirect()
      Redirects root URL to the main index page.
      Returns:
      redirect string to /index.

    • showInsertUrlPage

      @GetMapping("/insert-url") public String showInsertUrlPage()
      Renders the insert URL form page.
      Returns:
      name of the insert-url template.

    • insertUrl

      @PostMapping("/insert-url") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> insertUrl(@RequestParam String url, @RequestParam(defaultValue="false") boolean prioritize)
      Handles insertion of a URL into the indexing queue.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to insert.
      prioritize - Whether to insert it at the front of the queue.
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or error.

    • showIndexPage

      @GetMapping("/index") public String showIndexPage(@RequestParam(value="input",required=false) String input, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="hackerNews",defaultValue="off") String hackerNews, @RequestParam(value="ResultOpenAI",defaultValue="off") String ResultOpenAI, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute("searchCache") List<SearchResult> searchCache, @ModelAttribute("inputCache") String inputCache, @ModelAttribute("openaiCache") String openaiCache, @ModelAttribute("ResultOpenAICache") String ResultOpenAICache)
      Displays the main search page, handles new searches, pagination, and optionally integrates OpenAI results and HackerNews URLs insertions.
      Parameters:
      input - User input string.
      page - Page number for pagination.
      hackerNews - Whether to include HackerNews analysis.
      ResultOpenAI - Whether to request OpenAI-based results.
      model - Spring model.
      Returns:
      view name to render.

    • checkConnections

      @GetMapping("/url-connections") public Object checkConnections(@RequestParam(value="input",required=false) String input, @RequestParam(defaultValue="1") int page, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves URLs connected to a given input URL and renders the results page.
      Parameters:
      input - The input URL.
      page - Page number for pagination.
      model - Spring model.
      Returns:
      View or error message.

    • showStatistics

      @GetMapping("/statistics") public String showStatistics(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the system statistics page.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring model to inject statistics.
      Returns:
      Name of the statistics view template.

    • sendStatistics

      @MessageMapping("/statistics") public void sendStatistics()
      Sends real-time system statistics over WebSocket to subscribed clients. Used by STOMP via @MessageMapping.

      Parameters:
      message - Optional error message.
      model - Spring model to hold message.
      Returns:
      error page name.
